title: PPPP’s Taj Muhammad wins PS-71 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Pakistan Peoples Party Parliamentarians’ (PPPP) Taj Muhammad has won the Sindh Assembly election from PS-71 Badin-IV by securing 41,134 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Kamal Khan Chang, an independent candidate who bagged 6,130 votes.
Overall voters’ turn-out remained 51.03%.
